mapper.select: select id, name, voltage, capacity, starting_material, create_time, update_time, del_flag from electricity.t_electricity_battery_model where id = #{id}
select id, name, voltage, capacity, starting_material, create_time, update_time, del_flag from electricity.t_electricity_battery_model limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into electricity.t_electricity_battery_model(name, voltage, capacity, starting_material, create_time, update_time, del_flag) values (#{name}, #{voltage}, #{capacity}, #{startingMaterial}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag})
mapper.update:
update electricity.t_electricity_battery_model
name = #{name},
voltage = #{voltage},
capacity = #{capacity},
starting_material = #{startingMaterial},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
where id = #{id}
